= Installing Snofyre =

==Prerequisites==
<table border=0>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>[http://snofyre.googlecode.com/files/klipper.png]</td>
      <td>Snofyre and its installer require [http://www.java.com Java] to be installed on the client machine. Please [http://www.java.com/en/download/index.jsp download] and install Java on your machine first. Snofyre also needs an instance of [http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/ MySQL server] to be installed on the client machine. The Installation Manual will help you with this (see below).</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

== Download Snofyre Installer == 
<table border=0>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>[http://code.google.com/p/snofyre/downloads/list http://snofyre.googlecode.com/files/ark.png] </td>
      <td>Download the Snofyre Installer from the [http://code.google.com/p/snofyre/downloads/list downloads page]. <ul><li>Windows installer direct download [http://snofyre.googlecode.com/files/Snofyre-1.8-Installer.exe link]</li><li>Cross platform installer direct download [http://snofyre.googlecode.com/files/Snofyre-1.8-Installer.jar link].</li></ul>.</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

==Run Snofyre Installer ==
<table border=0>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>[http://snofyre.googlecode.com/svn/docs/installationmanual/index.html http://snofyre.googlecode.com/files/contents2.png]</td>
      <td>Follow instructions in the [http://snofyre.googlecode.com/svn/docs/installationmanual/index.html Online Installation Manual]. You can also download the Installation Manual as [http://snofyre.googlecode.com/files/snofyre-installation-manual.pdf PDF]. <ul><li>If you have problems with the installer's D FTP download feature, select installation type 'Update'.</li> <li>Manually download the NHS_SNOFYREDATA pack from the [http://www.uktcregistration.nss.cfh.nhs.uk/trud3/user/guest/home new TRUD site] using your browser.</li><li>Extract pack contents to the installation folder, using 7zip, WinRar, WinZip or something similar.</li></ul></td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
